Edges-Sorcerer -- Female Human Heroic Sorcerer
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d12 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d12
Skills (18 Points):
Alchemy: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d6 Occult: (sma) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Weird Science: (sma) d4
Gambling: (sma) d4 Research: (sma) d4
Intimidation: (spi) d6 Spellcasting: (sma) d12
Size: 0
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 8; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (5 points): Arcane Background (Sorcerer); Great Power; New Powers; Phenomenal Power; Power Points Hindrances: Cursed+; Greedy; Talisman Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Sorcerer): Has Armor Interference, Corruption+, and Overpower features
Greedy: Demands more than a fair share
Combat
Parry: 3 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Natural Shirt Shield: Small Shield Weapons: Hand Crossbow (2d4 R5"); Knife (d6+d4 R3"); Meteor Hammer (d6+d6); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes: Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 20
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Sorcerer): 3 Powers/15 Power Points
New Powers: +2 Power Count
Power Points: +5 Power Points
Arcane Background (Sorcerer)-1: Critical failure on Spellcasting inflicts Fatigued, Stunned, and Corruption
Armor Interference: -4 arcane skill rolls and cannot use arcane edge features in medium or heavy armor
Corruption+: Critical failure on arcane skill inflicts additional or increased hindrance until next advance
Cursed+: Powers cast to aid self suffer -2 arcane skill; critical failure stuns caster
Great Power: May spend a Benny to cast any power up to 20 PP at -2 penalty; failure inflicts permanent loss of 1 attribute die type
Overpower: May spend 1/3/5 PP to improve Spellcasting roll by +1/+2/+3; cannot improve critical failure
Phenomenal Power: May spend Conviction to cast any power up to 20 PP at -2 penalty; failure inflicts permanent loss of 1 attribute die type
Talisman: -1 arcane skill rolls when talisman unavailable; critical failure stuns
